description.value:
Trigger The mirror breaks

Effect The mirror releases a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Dandasuka] rakshasa. The raktavarna rolls initiative and remains for 3 rounds, after which the spell ends and the rakshasa disappears. The summoned raktavarna can use 3 actions each round and can use reactions, unlike most summoned creatures.

Trigger Fasiel is within 100 feet, this is the closest intact wicked reflections hazard, and a hostile creature's action would cause Fasiel to gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused], controlled, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fascinated], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed], petrified, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained], slowed, stunned, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious] condition or would deal 20+ damage to Fasiel

Effect The mirror breaks and disrupts the action.

details.description: Ornate full-length mirrors with fiendish filigree depict the image of Fasiel ibn Sazadin in villainous triumph over his enemies.
details.disable: @Check[type:stealth|dc:27] (trained) to approach a mirror without showing up in the reflection, followed by @Check[type:thievery|dc:25] to cover mirror or dispel magic (3nd level; counteract DC 25) to counteract the binding
